Every sound carries, which is openly admitted. The other guests were quiet and respectful, so it was no issue for me. You can always set the thermostat to continuous fan. The bathroom shower is very nice—plenty of water pressure and spacious. The unit is tastefully decorated, and most importantly, the bed was comfortable. Too many places have such soft mattresses that you sink into the middle, so it was nice to have a firmer, more level mattress. Overall, I was very pleased with my choice.
